author: smuzaffar
body:
As mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4882, this will be needed for DQMGUI once we have 6.14 in a CMSSW release.

FYI @schneiml , @rovere, @andrius-k, @kmaeshima, @jfernan2, @fioriNTU .
title: [COMP][DQMGUI] Sync Root 6.14 changes from IB/CMSSW_10_6_X/rootnext branch
